GSD.product_version: versions from v3.18 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
ARM: OMAP2+: Fix refcount leak in omap3xxx_prm_late_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit c9ec7993d00250a394d367c8a19fcfe8211c258b, it was introduced in version v3.18 by commit 1e037794f7f00ff464db446ace892dae84175a6a. For more details please see the references link.
